sentences.sentence: There is inconsistency even among prominent evangelistic organisations.
sentences.translation: 即使在显著的传道组织中，也存在矛盾。

sentences.sentence: He peddled his theories of excellence with the exuberance and evangelistic zeal of a 19th-century cough-syrup salesman.
sentences.translation: 他传播着他的日益蓬勃的精湛理论和19世纪止咳糖浆的销售员般的热情。
